name: 劉建宏
objective: 本課程目標旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。學生將會學習，開發一個高品質軟體所需要的軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、技術、與步驟。本課程將介紹下列主題：專案流程、專案管理與規劃、.系統需求分析、系統設計方法、系統測試與驗證、系統維護方法等。
schedule:
Week              Topics
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
1                 Introduction (軟體危機與流程)
2                 Software processes
3                 Agile software development
4                 軟體專案計畫與管理 (Project planning)
5                 Requirement engineering (需求工程)
6                 System modeling
7                 Architectural design
8                 Design and implementation
9                 Midterm Exam
10               物件導向軟體開發 
11               軟體設計
12               Software testing (軟體測試)
13               Software evolution
14               軟體建構管理 (Configuration management)
15               軟體品質管理與保證 (Quality management)
16               軟體流程改善 (Process improvement)
17               Project Presentation
18               Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Homework and Attendances (15%)
2. Exams: a. Midterm (25%); b. Final (25%)
3. Project (35%)
materials:
Textbook:
Software Engineering, 10th Edition, Ian Sommerville, Pearson, 2015. (高立圖書代理)
Object-Oriented Software Engineering: An Agile Unified Methodology, David Kung, McGraw-Hill, 2013.
軟體工程，李允中，高立圖書，(Software Engineering, McGraw-Hill)，2009.

Reference Books:
Software Engineering: A Practitioner's Approach, 8th Edition, Roger S. Pressman, McGraw-Hill, 2015.
